name: No Trick Or Treaters
description:
There once was a scientist who conducted experiment peacefully. He created a dream planet of his own. But on Halloween night, three children came knocking asking for candy despite his sign of "No Trick Or Treaters!".

Controls:

Move LeftA or Left ArrowMove RightD or Right ArrowJumpW or Up ArrowGravity GunLMBCommandQInteractEPauseEsc or Enter

Art - Sunny Summer Sky Arts https://www.artstation.com/sunnysummersky
Audio - Dmytro Nebesh https://rcrft.co/reel/dnebesh/games
